metadata.description: Added 3 new options to the codelist: QP - Purchase of Equity, QS - Sale of Equity ,CG - Credit Guarantee

codelist-item.name: Partially tied
codelist-item.description: Official Development Assistance for which the associated goods and services must be procured in the donor country or among a restricted group of other countries, which must however include substantially all aid recipient countries.

codelist-item.name: Tied
codelist-item.description: Official grants or loans where procurement of the goods or services involved is limited to the donor country or to a group of countries which does not include substantially all aid recipient countries.

codelist-item.name: Untied
codelist-item.description: Untied aid is defined as loans and grants whose proceeds are fully and freely available to finance procurement from all OECD countries and substantially all developing countries.
